Dear {!SFDC_Service_Timecard_c.Contact_First_Name_c),
VinSolutions understands there are many vendors in which your dealership can use and values the opportunity to work with you.
Our records show you have recently completed one of our Virtual Training classes. In our Virtual Training Department, we work diligently to provide you with the highest level of training and the most up to date information on your VinSolutions products. Therefore, we would like to hear about your experience. We value your feedback as it allows us to recognize our trainers for what they do well and helps us identify areas in which we can continue to improve.
Please select the link below and take a few moments to complete our Virtual Training Survey.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=1kzn4mujy7i6xz&q1=%7b!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Id%7d&q2=%7b!Contact.Id%7d
If you need any assistance or have questions, please reach out to our Virtual Training Manager, Jennifer Merrick.
Respectfully,
Your VinSolutions Virtual Training Team
